key.name: caja-extension-debug
key.summary: Should Caja extension output debug statements
key.description: Should Caja extension output debug statements. The value should be set to true if it should.

key.name: checksum-image
key.summary: The type of checksum used for images
key.description: Set to 0 for MD5, 1 for SHA1 and 2 for SHA256

key.name: checksum-files
key.summary: The type of checksum used for files
key.description: Set to 0 for MD5, 1 for SHA1 and 2 for SHA256

key.name: tmpdir
key.summary: Directory to use for temporary files
key.description: Contains the path to the directory where parrillada should store temporary files. If that value is empty, the default directory set for glib will be used.

key.name: engine-group
key.description: Contains the name of the favourite burn engine suite installed. It will be used if possible.

key.name: plugins
key.summary: White list of additional plugins to use
key.description: Contains the list of additional plugins Parrillada will use to burn discs. If set to NULL, Parrillada will load them all.

key.name: immed-flag
key.description: Whether to use the "-immed" flag with cdrecord. Use with caution (set to true) as it's only a workaround for some drives/setups.

key.name: dao-flag
key.summary: Whether to use the "-use-the-force-luke=dao" flag with growisofs
key.description: Whether to use the "-use-the-force-luke=dao" flag with growisofs. Set to false, parrillada won't use it; it may be a workaround for some drives/setups.

key.name: minbuf-value
key.summary: Used in conjunction with the "-immed" flag with cdrecord
key.description: Used in conjunction with the "-immed" flag with cdrecord.

key.name: raw-flag
key.summary: Whether to use the "--driver generic-mmc-raw" flag with cdrdao
key.description: Whether to use the "--driver generic-mmc-raw" flag with cdrdao. Set to True, parrillada will use it; it may be a workaround for some drives/setups.

key.name: iso-folder
key.summary: The last browsed folder while looking for images to burn
key.description: Contains the absolute path of the directory that was last browsed for images to burn

key.name: viewer
key.description: Whether to display file preview. Set to true to use it.

key.name: hidden
key.description: Should parrillada filter hidden files. Set to true, parrillada will filter hidden files.

key.name: replace-sym
key.summary: Replace symbolic links by their targets
key.description: Should parrillada replace symbolic links by their target files in the project. Set to true, parrillada will replace symbolic links.

key.name: broken-sym
key.summary: Should parrillada filter broken symbolic links
key.description: Should parrillada filter broken symbolic links. Set to true, parrillada will filter broken symbolic links.

key.name: priority
key.summary: The priority value for the plugin
key.description: When several plugins are available for the same task, this value is used to determine which plugin should be given priority. 0 means the plugin's native priority is used. A positive value overrides the plugin's native priority. A negative value disables the plugin.

key.name: flags
key.description: This value represents the burning flags that were used in such a context the last time.

key.name: speed
key.description: This value represents the speed that was used in such a context the last time.
